solution_line_template: He used to make {old_job_hourly_rate}*{old_job_hours_per_week}=${<<{old_job_hourly_rate}*{old_job_hours_per_week}={old_job_weekly_pay}>>}{old_job_weekly_pay} per week
So his raise was {new_job_weekly_pay}-{old_job_weekly_pay}=${<<{new_job_weekly_pay}-{old_job_weekly_pay}={weekly_raise}>>}{weekly_raise} per week
So he makes {weekly_raise}*{weeks_per_year}=${<<{weekly_raise}*{weeks_per_year}={annual_raise}>>}{annual_raise} per year more
